name: dokemon
description: Dokemon is a Kubernetes cluster monitoring and management dashboard. It visualizes workloads, namespaces, resources, and events in an accessible web interface, making cluster status and troubleshooting more approachable for platform teams.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View all Kubernetes resources including pods, services, and deployments in a unified dashboard

features.title: Namespace Management
features.description: Switch between namespaces and filter resources by scope for organized multi-tenant environments

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Access container logs directly from the interface without kubectl commands for faster troubleshooting

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Start, stop, and scale deployments through the web UI with immediate feedback on status changes

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Respect Kubernetes permissions to show only resources accessible to the authenticated user
